Text: will someone upload Fubar 2 ? its been out of theaters for a bit now (seen it on the bell expressvu ppv to)

720p my ass!

Looks all blurry, like something that was never 720, but just resized to 720p.

The whole thing is blurry, and it's very poorly deinterlaced, creating blurry double edges whenever there is movement.

Don't get this. It's completely shit.
